item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldgpc6mhns2s
item.description: Couldn’t really enjoy Jack + Coke when drinking alone.
item.content:encoded: Couldn’t really enjoy Jack + Coke when drinking alone.

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldggnn2elc2s
item.description: A lot of #Mastodon users hating on #Bluesky, primarily because of its centralized nature. I wonder if these same users realize how much they are relying on their Mastodon instance administrotor (e.g. mastodon.social) instead of bsky.social.
item.content:encoded: A lot of #Mastodon users hating on #Bluesky, primarily because of its centralized nature. I wonder if these same users realize how much they are relying on their Mastodon instance administrotor (e.g. mastodon.social) instead of bsky.social.

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldg2u5qzbc2g
item.description: Jekyll themes like Just the Docs and Chirpy are some of the reasons why I would like to revisit my decision in the #Hugo vs. #Jekyll debate. deuts.org/∞ #GoHugo
item.content:encoded: Jekyll themes like Just the Docs and Chirpy are some of the reasons why I would like to revisit my decision in the #Hugo vs. #Jekyll debate. deuts.org/∞ #GoHugo

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldg2q4dntc2g
item.description: I’m torn between Bytestash and Opengist for my snippets repository. I love Opengist’s clean and simple design, but Bytestash’s robust search functionality is hard to overlook. github.com/∞ github.com/∞
item.content:encoded: I’m torn between Bytestash and Opengist for my snippets repository. I love Opengist’s clean and simple design, but Bytestash’s robust search functionality is hard to overlook. github.com/∞ github.com/∞

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldg2mfdy4s2g
item.description: I don’t see much point in self-hosting PortChecker if it’s just for checking port status, which you can do on the official website anyway. Unless you’re set on hosting everything, it feels unnecessary! www.youtube.com/∞
item.content:encoded: I don’t see much point in self-hosting PortChecker if it’s just for checking port status, which you can do on the official website anyway. Unless you’re set on hosting everything, it feels unnecessary! www.youtube.com/∞

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldfzm5nsys2g
item.description: Explore the differences between Linkding and Hoarder, two popular bookmark management tools. Learn about their features, resource usage, and unique offerings to find the best fit for your needs. deuts.org/∞
item.content:encoded: Explore the differences between Linkding and Hoarder, two popular bookmark management tools. Learn about their features, resource usage, and unique offerings to find the best fit for your needs. deuts.org/∞

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3ldfbpagp7s2s
item.description: I’m contemplating whether I should get an Apple TV or not. Any compelling reason why I should do so? I already have Google Chromecast with Google TV and Onn 4K. The Onn device is so buggy I though I could use an Apple TV in its stead.
item.content:encoded: I’m contemplating whether I should get an Apple TV or not. Any compelling reason why I should do so? I already have Google Chromecast with Google TV and Onn 4K. The Onn device is so buggy I though I could use an Apple TV in its stead.
